plot: Nostradamus writes a letter for his young son, and his prophecies are compared to events of the French Revolution.
title: Let's Ask Nostradamus (Prophecies of Nostradamus #2)
plot_es: Nostradamus writes a letter for his young son, and his prophecies are compared to events of the French Revolution.
plot_en: Nostradamus writes a letter for his young son, and his prophecies are compared to events of the French Revolution.
